RMG

    137 species
    1349 total reactions
    1028 unique reactions














NIST

    188 species 
    1597 total reactions (there are 6 NIST reactions that satisfy .is_isomorphic() with two different RMG reactions! keep this in mind)
    1276 unique reactions













Common

    321 common reactions
        - none of the common reactions are from the halogen chemistry families
    157 of these have different kinetics
